MemoryInfobox.name: Of Sharks and Spartans
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A Spartan spy discovered a shipwreck full of sunken Athens|Athenian weaponry. The spy had more difficulty in discovering a way to deal with the Great white shark|sharks.'

General_Description: '''Of Sharks and Spartans''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[Sparta]]n spy wanted Kassandra's help with some weapons in an ocean full of [[Great white shark|sharks]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. :'''Note:'''
''[[Athens|Athenians]] are excellent runners. They run away so often, their boats have holes.'' She sought out the Spartan [[soldier]] and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's happened?'' *'''Man:''' ''An Spartan [[ship]] was sunk just off the coast. The warriors on board will never see battle again, but their weapons still could. The ship was carrying a [[Treasure chest|chest]] with their gear.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So go get them.'' *'''Man:''' ''Spartans weren't made for fighting the sharks in these waters.'' |-|You want it recovered from the ocean.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to go diving for it?'' *'''Man:''' ''That would be the idea, yes.'' (Accept – I'll bring it to you.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.'' *'''Man:''' ''Please, get it done.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.'' Kassandra dove into the ocean and recovered the weapons. Afterwards, she returned to the soldier. *'''Man:''' ''Did you get it?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.'' *'''Man:''' ''Thank you, mercenary. Now, your reward.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.'' |-|You want the sharks gutted.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to gut all the sharks.'' *'''Man:''' ''Yes, all of them must die.'' (Accept – I'll handle it.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll handle this.'' *'''Man:''' ''Please, get it done.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I'm done.'' Kassandra dove into the ocean and killed the sharks. Afterwards, she returned to the soldier. *'''Man:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Man:''' ''Well done! Sparta is in your debt. Here, as thanks.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra either recovered the weapons or killed the sharks, and in return was rewarded.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
